item.description:
Last chance to visit the FMSSF booth at the Plimoth Plantation Farmers Market this year.

Learn about native plants and the advantages of using them in your garden.  Purchase native plants grown from seeds collected in southeastern Massachusetts by FMSSF members.

Learn about the Friends group and its mission to work for Myles Standish State Forest and  foster responsible, as well as enjoyable, use of the forest through its Meetup group and public events.

Support the Friends by buying a FMSSF T-shirt or joining the group and getting a free plant or other membership offers.

The Farmers Market is open from 2:30-6:30 in the field beyond the Plimoth Plantation parking lot or come in by Ryan Road and park closer to the action.  Pick up local produce and much more while you browse the other booths. Entry and parking are free.

HOPE TO SEE YOU THERE!

group.name: Friends of Myles Standish State Forest Meetup Group

item.name: Visit FMSSF at the Plimoth Plantation Farmers Market
